item.title: ISTA-EU Project Kick-off meeting
item.description: Kick-off meeting The three-year Erasmus+ project ISTA-EU (Innovative STEM teaching practices in Albania towards European Integration) was launched at 13 December 2022 in Tirana, Albania.
